name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Mid-Level Full Stack Engineer with expertise in **C#**, **.NET**, and advanced skills in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, I bring 8+ years of software engineering experience, specializing in backend-focused development. Proficient in database management with **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **DynamoDB**, I ensure robust data solutions that scale. My technical proficiency includes building dynamic frontends using **React** and implementing cloud services on **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** to enhance application performance and reliability. Familiar with modern development methodologies, I employ **Gherkin** and **SpecFlow** for behavior-driven development, and utilize **Terraform** for infrastructure as code. My background in Agile practices and commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions demonstrates my ability to meet business needs effectively.
